snippet: A deal with its landlord will keep the nonprofit Dance New Amsterdam, which over the years has presented artists like Mark Morris, in its home in Lower Manhattan.
abstract: A deal with its landlord will keep the nonprofit Dance New Amsterdam, which over the years has presented artists like Mark Morris, in its home in Lower Manhattan.

headline.main: Dance New Amsterdam Saved From Eviction
headline.print_headline: Dance New Amsterdam Settles Rent Dispute
